content: in patt over the instep and stockinette on the back of foot/sole bor at the beginning of instep increase round one k 30 32 34 36 instep st k1 m1 k 28 30 32 34 m1 k1 = total of 32 34 36 38 for the back/sole knit 4 more round follow patt on instep and stockinette st on the back increase round two k30 32 34 36 instep st k1 m1 k30 32 34 36 m1 k1 = total of 34 36 38 40 for back/sole knit 4 more round follow patt on instep and stockinette st on the back increase round three k30 32 34 36 instep st k1 m1 k32 34 36 38 m1 k1 = total of 36 38 40 42 for back/sole knit 4 more round follow patt on instep and stockinette st on the back begin short-row heel you should have this st count 30 32 34 36 for instep and 36 38 40 42 for the sole/back of sock mark your place in the patt to be able to return to it after the heel knit the instep in patt plus 2 3 3 4 st from the back of the sock with the front instep needle s then slip 2 3 3 4 st from the other side of the back to the front instep needle from now on you will work the heel flat in stockinette st with only st left on the back of the sock please do not sell distribute copy etc this pattern without permission @4crinialbi 2 unexpected day off by rodica iosif you will make the heel over 32 32 34 34 st pm in the middle i e you need to have 16 16 17 17 st on each side of the marker sm on each row to keep it in the same place until you finish the heel r 1 k until 2 st left on left needle w&t r 3 k until 2 st to the gap w&t e g knit to 1 st before the wrapped st on left needle w&t r 2 p until 2 st left on left needle w&t r 4 p until 2 st to the gap w&t e g purl to 1 st before the wrapped st left needle w&t repeat r 3 and r 4 until you have 6 st on each side of the marker then 9 9 10 10 w&t st plus one st on each side of marker you have just done the last w&t after turning knit side should face you knit to marker sm k 6 to first w&t with right hand needle lift the wrapped yarn bar farthest from you from the purl side of work on the left needle the right leg of the wrap should be in front of the needle then knit it through the back loop knit the next st the st that was wrapped so from each wrapped st you will get 2 st continue working
